features: 【PARTICULAR DESIGN】 - The excellent design of karaoke microphones is very suitable for your hand, which let you feel more comfortable. And the built-in high-quality Bluetooth module can be used as a wireless speaker, mp3 player, and recorder, compatible with various singing applications.

【TWO WAYS CONNECTION】- Bluetooth Connection & Cable Connection. You just need to connect your phone with cable or Bluetooth, and then open the singing APP on your phone. The built-in clear audio and the vividly sound effect let you listen and sing anytime and anywhere.
【HIGH COMPATIBILITY】- Supporting micro SD card max 32GB(NOT INCLUDED) and song switch. The Bluetooth has a great distance of connection(10m).

【EASY TO USE】- Multi-function buttons, easy to switch to different modes, adjust microphone, echo, and music volume separately, enjoy singing along with the music. With echo mode, a karaoke mic can bring a surrounding immersion.

【MICROPHONE FOR KIDS & ADULTS】-Come with 1* BONAOK microphone, 1* Audio Cable, 1*Charge Cable, 1*User Manual, and 1*Colorful Box. Cute gifts idea for kids, teens and adults, friends and family, suitable for all kinds of holidays and festivals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Three-Layers of Noise Reduction BONAOK Karaoke Wireless Microphone has three layers of filter head, which can greatly reduce the noise produced when singing. And it uses denoising technology that filters air flow and wind noise effectively, allowing you to always sing with perfect clarity.

Louder and Powerful Sound The Speakers in the microphone that is good quality and sound. And the sound quality is improved by 30% with the Update Bass Diaphragm Cavity, which gives you the stronger shock and heavier sense and makes you feel like you're singing in a KTV. And the Professional Mixer allows you to switch freely so that you can choose any mode you want and then enjoy yourself

Two Way Connection Bluetooth Mode(Sing along with music) Pair the mic to your phone via Bluetooth, play songs from any app on your phone like YouTube, or Music App and stream the music directly to the microphone. Adjust the voice and music volume to sing along! Audio Cable(Sing Record at the same time) Plug micro USB end of audio cable into mic and another 3.5mm audio end into your phone. Turn on the recording app in your phone and sing then your voice will be recorded in the phone. Note: Bluetooth will be auto disconnected when audio cable plugged in. Professional Mixer Specification: Color:Rose Gold; Material: Aluminium AlloyWeight: 365g(12.87oz)Output Power: 6W(Speaker Output)Charging Voltage: DC 5V 1A; Charging Time: 2 hoursSing Time: Up to 5-10 hoursProducts Size: 9.45*2.95*2.36inTransmission Distance: 10m(32.8ft)Reverb Mode: Echo sound reverberation Gathering singing Package Includes: 1 x BONAOK Karaoke Singing Microphone 1 x BONAOK Colorful Hard Box 1 x Micro USB Cable 1 x Audio Cable 1 x Instruction Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Audaciously inaudible singers rejoice!
reviews.reviewText: Greatest of glory be ware! We tone deaf heroes are on the march with this magnificent musical toy. I bought this for my wife for Christmas and to my surprise her cloddish brother snatched it from her hands inviting all kinds of sibling rivalry resentments to the center of our jovial celebrations. He instinctively began divulging the most basic of thoughts as he encountered them like some torturous streaming of consciousness. Soon after the toy disappeared for many weeks… until it was new year’s, my wife had been drinking since noon, and her inner diva demanded dominion. She and one of her best friends sprung out before all our guests and began screeching and wailing some butchered versions of a fleetwood mac song. The grip of trauma raced around the room like an evil spirit trying to possess us, evident by the wave of soured faces. Our guests demanded they stop the torment or they’d leave. I was elated when my wife through all manner of infantile protestations relented and released us from our pain. Until ten minutes later when she and her friend bust out again like the opening act for hell. And so our guests stormed off writhing in agony. However after they had finished a tenth song of utter musical calamity they invited other weary family to join in the mayhem. The device itself does not produce a full musical sound. It is flat and sounds a bit like music is being played in a different room. However it does make clear the song and does deliver clearly the voice being sung. We haven’t used any of the effects yet. It paired easily with different phones and we were able to find ample songs with lyrics on Apple Music and YouTube. Once those two banshees had finished that is when the joy begun. Suddenly we were all romantically falling into the abyss of our dreams as celebrated singers. We hit the high notes, dazzled on the runs and belted with great passion the essence of truth of the songs we sung. Suddenly our captors had become our creators and we could rejoice with them in their songs too. It was a strange pivot to experience. We sang gleefully into the new year with abandon and love for the songs we cherished. My recommendation is to get one, sing to your heart’s content and let the scoffers be damned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great buy. I love that it easily connects to any device via Bluetooth.Only con, it’s not that loud. Maybe I need to find a way to hook it up to a speaker. Other than that, I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adequate for a smaller room
reviews.reviewText: Easy to connect to Bluetooth and then to sing along with a karaoke app (or Karaoke mode in Iphone's Music app). But the volume control is virtually useless. It's pretty quiet at the "highest" setting. Music is not as loud as the volume from my iphone. But the quality is decent. And it otherwise functions as advertised. I love that it comes with a built-in USB rechargeable battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ulimate Mic For A Girls Trip
reviews.reviewText: Our recent girls' trip became an unforgettable adventure, and one of the reasons behind the unforgettable memories was this fantastic microphone. It's the kind of accessory you didn't know you needed until you had it, and it added so much fun to our trip. Each lady purchased a different color. First off, the portability of this microphone is a major win. It's compact, lightweight, and fits easily into a small bag, making it the ideal travel companion. We carried it around effortlessly, whether we were exploring the city, lounging on the beach, or having late-night karaoke sessions in our cozy Airbnb. The sound quality was surprisingly impressive for a device of this size. It delivered crystal-clear sound, which was perfect for impromptu sing-alongs and capturing the laughter and chatter of our group. Plus, it's compatible with smartphones, so we were able to record our adventures and preserve our favorite moments with ease. The wireless connectivity was a game-changer. It meant no fumbling with cords or being tethered to a speaker. We could pass the mic around or dance around it, adding a whole new dimension to our party nights and outdoor escapades.The battery life exceeded our expectations. It lasted all day and then some, so we never had to worry about it running out of juice in the middle of the fun. Charging was quick, which was a lifesaver. But what truly set this microphone apart was the versatility. It had built-in effects, like reverb and echo, which allowed us to channel our inner pop stars and create entertaining vocal performances. It even doubled as a Bluetooth speaker for our playlists. In summary, this microphone was an unexpected highlight of our girls' trip. It added a layer of fun, entertainment, and memories that we'll cherish forever. If you're planning a getaway with friends and want to take your adventures to the next level, this microphone is a must-have. It's versatile, portable, and endlessly entertaining. Our trip wouldn't have been the same without it, and I can't recommend it enough for anyone seeking to amplify their travel experiences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the second microphone/speaker I have purchased. It took me a minute to figure out how it all worked. There are no instructions included. But the speaker is loud enough to just play music, the battery seems to last for several hours, and the microphone is good. The colors are bright and pretty (I have the hot pink and the green). The clip on the carrying case is awesome. Really shows you mean business walking into the karaoke bar wearing this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars My girls like it
reviews.reviewText: Overall ok product . Connect really easy, it’s appealing , and works well most of the times . What I don’t like is that sometimes ,while using it just randomly stops working for a few seconds ( the volume completely gone )also and cannot be move a lot cause you can hear a lot of static or shut off . Which is sad cause my girls like stinging and dancing at the same time . They like it and don’t seem to care . Is just a toy so for the price it’s ok I guess . Haven’t decide if I return or keep it .
Todo está muy bien excepto el sonido, es muy bajo y se escucha poco

The karaoke mic is a fantastic addition to my home entertainment setup. The sound quality is great, making my karaoke nights with friends a blast. It's easy to use, and the wireless feature adds convenience to the overall experience. For anyone who loves singing their heart out, this microphone is a solid choice.
Tiene un sonido bueno por el precio (no esperes una bocina profesional), su batería dura bastante bien, nos hemos divertido bastante con él en los últimos días.
